# Development of a Secure Web Application (Extranet)
We wish to develop a **secure web application** (Extranet) allowing our **external clients** (individuals, businesses, partners) to access their files in real time, track progress, and interact with our internal teams.
**Objectives**: - Improve **transparency** and **collaboration**. - Reduce **email/phone exchanges**. - Automate **tracking processes**.
---
## Target Audience - **End customers** (individuals, businesses). - **Internal teams** (case managers, administrators, support). - **External partners** (subcontractors, experts, etc.).
---
## 1. Key Required Features
### **A. Client Portal (Front-Office)**
#### **Personalized Dashboard** - Synthetic view of files (ongoing/completed): - Status, key dates, alerts. - **Notifications** (push/email) for updates (e.g., *"Your file is pending validation"*). - **Advanced search** (by file number, date, type, etc.).
#### **File Management** - Viewing **associated documents** (PDFs, images, contracts). - **Comments/notes** between clients and internal teams (integrated messaging or discussion threads per file).
#### **Requests and Interactions** - Creation of **tickets** for specific requests (e.g., *"Contract modification request"*). - **Document upload** by clients (size/format restrictions). - **Integrated e-signature** (e.g., DocuSign, Yousign, or open-source APIs like SignServer).
#### **Shared Calendar** - Display of **deadlines** (payment dates, appointments, legal deadlines). - Sync with **Google Calendar/Outlook** (optional).
---
### **B. Back-Office (Administration)**
#### **User Management** - Creation/modification/deletion of **client accounts**. - **Roles and permissions** (e.g., standard client, admin, super-admin).
#### **File Management** - Creation/editing of files with **pre-filled templates** (e.g., standard contract template). - **Automatic assignment** of files to internal teams (business rules). - **Validation workflow** (e.g., *"Pending signature"* â†’ *"Validated"* â†’ *"Archived"*).
